# [rattler-build](../rattler-build.md) generate-recipe

Generate a recipe from PyPI, CRAN, CPAN, or LuaRocks

## Usage
```
rattler-build generate-recipe <COMMAND>
```

## Subcommands
| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| [`pypi`](generate-recipe/pypi.md) | Generate a recipe for a Python package from PyPI |
| [`cran`](generate-recipe/cran.md) | Generate a recipe for an R package from CRAN |
| [`cpan`](generate-recipe/cpan.md) | Generate a recipe for a Perl package from CPAN |
| [`luarocks`](generate-recipe/luarocks.md) | Generate a recipe for a Lua package from LuaRocks |
